1.title: Mastermind: CLI
1.description: A command line version of the classic Mastermind code breaking game using Node JS.

2.title: Mastermind: GUI
2.description: Mastermind with an all new GUI using React

3.title: Mastermind: Evolved
3.description: Create an account, store your game history and compare your skills against our leaderboard. Game built using Node + React + Redux + PostgreSQL.

4.title: Mastermind: Mobile
4.description: Take Mastermind where ever you go on your Android or iPhone! Game built using React Native.
